sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Lent, 1638 the learned reading of John Herne Esq., late of the Honourable Society of Lincolns-Inne, upon the Statute of 23 H. 8 cap. 3 concerning commissions of sewers / translated out of the French manusctipt [sic]. Herne, John, fl. 1644. Herne, John, fl. 1660.
[6], 30 p.
Printed for Matthew Walbanke ..., London : 1659.
Marginal notes. "Another John Herne ... appears to have been the elder Herne's son, and the translator of the reading"--Cf. DNB. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
Lent, 1638 the learned reading of John Herne Esq., late of the Honourable Society of Lincolns-Inne, upon the Statute of 23 H. 8 cap. 3 concerning commissions of sewers / translated out of the French manusctipt [sic]. Herne, John, fl. 1644. Herne, John, fl. 1660.
[6], 30 p.
Printed for Matthew Walbanke ..., London : 1659.
Marginal notes. "Another John Herne ... appears to have been the elder Herne's son, and the translator of the reading"--Cf. DNB. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Matthew Walbanke
